В данной игре вам представлены 2 класса: мелкий пэздюук и пьяный дед .
Играя за пэздюка вам нужно завести 5 моторов от старых жиг и убежать обратно к родителям в Мухосранск .
При игре за деда вам нужно поймать 4 внуков (иногда вы сомневаетесь ваши ли это внучата) и дать им пэздюлей за,то что они выпили ваше последнее пиво и не дать им завести моторы от жигулей ,а то мало ли что-нибудь сломают .
В игре присутствует кастомизация персонажей ,но рассмотрю только деда.Вам доступны образы начиная с облеваной майки и заканчивая белой,а так же черной ночнушкой .
Здесь есть прокачка .Добрая бабушка ,которая всегда стоит в тени может дать вам любые предметы и улучшения для них взамен за красную смородину ,но если вы будете наглеть некоторые предметы ,она заберёт  обратно.
В целом игра классная и всем рекомендую

Jogo é um pouco abusado, acredito que falta mellhorar muitas ferramentas, infelizmente solicitado o reembolso.
Quem sabe um dia né?

EDITADO : 


 RESUMO :  

         O JOGO É BASEADO EM QUATROS SOBREVIVENTES E UM ASSASSINO, NO QUAL SOBREVIVERÃO OU MORRERÃO!

 OS SOBREVIVENTES E ASSASSINOS CONTAM COM 4 HABILIDADES ÚNICAS NO QUAL DEVE-SE APRENDE-LAS DURANTE A TELHA DE SANGUE, A TELHA DE SANGUE É UM SISTEMA NO QUAL O JOGADOR TERÁ QUE ESCOLHER ALGUNS ITENS OU HABILIDADES NO LOBBY, ANTES DE COMEÇAR A PARTIDA PORÉM É NECESSÁRIO HAVER PONTOS DE SANGUE PARA COMPLETAR A FAMOSA TELHA DE SANGUE, PARA OBTER PONTOS É BEM SIMPLES (SERVIRÁ PARA ASSASSINO TAMBÉM), A CADA AÇÃO FEITA NO JOGO, VOCÊ GANHARÁ PONTOS. QUANDO SE REPARA UM GERADOR, CURA UM ALIADO, SALVA UM ALIADO, SENDO PERSEGUIDO PELO ASSASSINO, PROFETIZANDO TOTENS E ETC. APÓS O TEMRINO DA PARTIDA, VOCÊ VERIFICARÁ QUANTO RECEBEU, O JOGO TAMBÉM CONSTA COM UM SISTEMA DE RANKED QUE OS JOGADORES CHAMAM DE PIP, É UM POUCO MAIS COMPLEXO PORÉM TODOS COMEÇAM NO RANK 20 E TERÃO QUE REDUZI-LO O MÁXIMO POSSÍVEL SÓ PODERÁ REALIZAR ESSE FEITO FAZENDO OS OBJETIVOS QUE FALAREI A BAIXO.

 - OS OBJETIVOS DOS SOBREVIVENTES :
 
  OS QUERIDOS SOBREVIVENTES TERÃO COM OBJETIVO REPARAR 5 GERADORES NO QUAL QUANDO TERMINAREM DE REPARAR TODOS OS 5, AUTOMATICAMENTE APARECERÁ DOIS PORTÕES PARA TENTAR FUGIR, ENQUANTO OS SOBREVIVENTES FAZEM ESSE TRABALHO QUE PARECE SER SUPER COMPLEXO, O ASSASSINO TERÁ APENAS QUE ATRAPALHAR OS SEUS DESEMPENHOS.
 OS SOBREVIVENTES E ASSASSINOS CONTAM COM 4 HABILIDADES ÚNICAS NO QUAL DEVE-SE APRENDE-LAS DURANTE A TELHA DE SANGUE.

 - OS OBJETIVOS DO ASSASSINO : 


 OS ODIADOS ASSASSINOS TERÃO COM OBJETIVO ATRAPALHAR, PERSEGUIR, ARTOMETAR, QUEBRAR GERADORES, MATA SUAS PRESAS.
SIM, SOMENTE ISSO. (MENTIRA HAHAHA)
 O ASSASSINO TERÁ QUE MATA OS SOBREVIVENTES, GERALMENTE TERÁ QUE BATER DUAS VEZES EM UM SOBREVIVENTE NO QUAL O DEIXARÁ NO CHÃO, EM SEGUIDAS, TERÁS QUE LEVA-LO ATÉ UM GANCHO, SERÁ NECESSÁRIO COLOCA-LO 3 VEZES NO GANCHO PARA QUE A ENTIDADE O LEVE PAR AO INFERNO, CASO NINGUÉM VENHA O SALVAR, NÃO SERÁ PRECISA COLOCA-LO NOVAMENTE NO GANCHO.


OBSERVAÇÕES : 
O ASSASSINO TEM A CÂMERA EM 1 PESSOA E OS SOVREVIVENTES TEM A CÂMERA EM 3 PESSOA, ISSO É BASTANTE DIVERTIDO POIS OS SOBREVIVENTES SE ENCONDEM FACILMENTE DO ASSASSINO.

SOBRE O EDIT :

EU REALMENTE ODIEI O JOGO NO COMEÇO POIS VIVIA MORRENDO PARA OS ASSASSINOS E COM ISSO EU NÃO OBTIA DIVERSÃO NO JOGO, ENTÃO, RESOLVI REEMBOLSAR MAS EU DEI UMA SEGUNDA CHANCE AO JOGO E ESTOU MUITO FELIZ O JOGANDO, ACREDITO QUE ESSE JOGO ESTÁ SENDO O MEU MELHOR PASSA-TEMPO E EU NÃO PRETENDO PARA-LO DE JOGAR TÃO CEDO.

Oh BHVR you've got yourself in a shit show now.

So, for the unaware, BHVR agreed to a deal where the current license holders could create NFTs using Pinhead's model, and they have the potential to allow people to access the Hellraiser DLC.

You'll also remember that Valve VERY RECENTLY announced that games utlizing NFTs and Blockchains would be deleted off of Steam, yes?

I hope the money was worth it, Behaviour.

I've got over 300 hours on this game.... would I recommend it.... yes and no

Wish there was an EH option instead of Yes or No, but I'll put No due to the reason I wouldn't recommend it outweighs the reasons I would

Great horror concept, is a lot of fun and great replayability.  Devs super active, and normally they are pretty decent to deal with.... at least from time to time.

Now here is the reason that I DON'T recommend it

The community..... its full of toxic assholes.  Granted I've met a lot of nice folks through this game, but the toxicity of the community in genereal is just unbelievable.  For every decent person you meet, you'll meet about 20 people who should delete the game and go back to F13 where the trolls belong... (another heartbreaking game to a Friday the 13th fan)

Anyhow, I'll leave it up to you if you play it or not, but if you do.... keep your calm, cause you will meet a bunch of salty and toxic assholes in this game.

这是一个悲壮的非对等竞技类型游戏，我们几位勤劳的农场主日复一日的辛勤工作，但每每看见莫名超支的电费单总是心痛不已。终于有一天，农场主在下班回家的路上发现了那几个偷电的小毛贼，我们可怜的农场主在多次劝阻无效之后，在偷电贼的蹲起嘲笑声中，终于举起了反击的旗帜，他的惩罚手段就是把猖狂的偷电贼抓住，然后绑在柱子上打电话报警，最后由警察出动武装直升机来将其带回警局给予其法律的严惩！！
  另外本游戏配乐诙谐幽默，躲猫猫的游戏过程老少皆宜适合各种类型的玩家，无论你是慕名而来还是通过某养猪场的辣鸡手游得知的，都希望你可以交个百元不到的首付，得到超过三位数的游戏体验!!推荐程度五颗星！！
Jogo ótimo, vale cada centavo.

Игра была прекрасна! Я прощал многое и постоянные ужасные патчи с ухудшение FPS, но с патчем 2.4.0 игра превратилась в балаган! Улучшили движок, ЗАЧЕМ?! Улучшели туман и в место того, чтобы сделать его как отдельный патч для тех кто хочет графона, но они добавили всем! И теперь на любой карте смотря в сторону центра 20-15 фпс (Было 40-120), а теперь играть не удобно от слово совсем! МАН ИМБА! И оптимизация в жопе. БРАВО!

[h1] DbDL [/h1]
Игра, которая поразила меня, и не только меня, ну тут однозначно лайк.

This game has a great concept, 1 vs 4, killers vs survivors can be great fun at first. However after player a good amount of time as the killer, this game has shown its too colours through the comunity and the devioplers. The survivor player are the worst prand of people ypu will ever come across. High level survivros torment the player by bullying them during the gamplay. If the killer doesnt do what the survivros wants, such as not camping, the surviros willl gang up on you and harrest you for just playing the game the way you want to play. Its a never ending story, you avoid this, its four players agaisnt 1 and you cannot mute the chat. The idea of the game is great but its excurected in the wrong way, the palents, the looping, perks like decisive strike isn't fun. Everything is agaisnt the killer, which leads me the devs of the game, they only care about the survivors. They listen to them too much, they complain about elemens in the game, which the players can over come themsleves. They do a very poor job in helping killers have a better expeience, instead of changing core elements of the game, they instead just relase certain perks or killers to answer the problem, but this has only coursed more problems and made the game worse. The change to the ranking system is another example of how the devs do not care about the killers, this game is also too expensive for its own good. each dlc killer is $8 each, the main game only comes with four, you have to buy the other 7 killlers which is way overprice. This game all together is Aud $85 and its only one game mode. No story, no other mutilplayer modes, its horriable. This is almost as expensive as evolve. If your looking to play classic movie killers, you can do that if ur willing pay for them. Howeer theyare considered the worse killers, who struggle agaisnt the survivors. The devs should have made these killers strong to gain more prase but they didnt, because they listen to the surivivors too much. In the end this game its turned into, a massive troll, toxic, repulsive, anrgy, disrespectful comunity who go about bullying people you dont get what they want. This game could damage your mental state, if ur looking for a game to relax and chill, like a break from study this isn't ur game. This will do more harm then good, the devs create a great idea but a toxic game that will leave you depressed.

So I´ve been playing this game for a while, and thought I had to finally make a review for it. 
I´ll start this of by a pros and cons (by my opinions).
Pros:
- Extremly fun game
- Constant updates and bugfixes
- Doesn´t require that much of your computer
- Easy to understand
- Play 2 win

Cons:
- Unbalanced gameplay at high ranks
- Players are salty as f***
- Takes WAY to long to get the good and useful perks
- Takes incredibly long time to get good at

So I just want to say, I really LOVE this game, it´s a whole lot of fun and it has so much potential. Also the devs seem to care about it and keep fixing bugs and trying to balance the game. Although this it gets quite boring after a while because it takes to much time to level up your characters which you need to do to get the better perks which in their turn is needed to be able to compete at higher ranks. Also as the killer you stand no chance at high ranks because good survivors are ALWAYS able to outplay even the best of killers. Hopefully the game is going to get fully balanced soon, and I really hope that the devs could make it easier to level up and get points for leveling up. Because that is really the only cons I see in the game right now. 
Really recommended if you want a game that is awarding you for playing, and also if you have the time to put down a few 100:s of hours into the game. If you want a game that is easy to learn and doesn´t take that much time I wouldn´t recommend it for you.

Впринципе игра хорошая,частые обновления и DLC ,но играть в эту игру не потратив деньги невозможно.Тебе придется покупать DLC ,так как простых маньяков и выживших мало и тебе надоест за них играть.Также почему то в этой игре частые вылеты из лобби,и это очень сильно бесит.Каждый 3 маньяк это кемпер и мне не понять почему разрабы никак не могут сделать анти-кемперство,а анти-манс с окнами они почему то сделали.

老早就知道了这游戏，以前看直播看了会，觉得有点恐怖，那个时候胆子还有点小，就没敢继续看，更别说上steam入手了。后来胆子慢慢肥起来了，开始玩一些恐怖游戏，后来正巧进了D5的手游内测。当时玩的第一感觉就有点黎明杀鸡的感觉，内测时候恐怖氛围还营造的可以，后来玩多了，感觉越来越不刺激了。加上内测时候又被告了说血腥恐怖暴力......没了手游的我想玩点恐怖游戏，于是就入手了杀机。刚完没几局，局局屠夫目送逃生者，四个人站在门口嘲讽，妈也那个气。出来一看都是20段，为啥都TM四个紫色的技能加几个道具，我他娘的一个技能也没有，就两个白色的道具....这匹配机制这么迷的嘛，简直实力劝退，总共赢的两句还是匹配到正常队友，百分之八十都能匹配到四个紫色技能的大佬。这游戏已经没有新鲜血液了么，尽是些老玩家。。。难受的一批

До недавнего обновления игра нравилась всем: более менее существовал баланс, получить каплю не составляло труда, одним словом- играть было ИНТЕРЕСНО. Сейчас же напрочь отсутствует баланс, если у тебя за сурва 17 ранг- к тебе заходят игроки, которые первый раз в игре. 
Если раньше можно было починить 2 генератора, помочь тиммейту и получить каплю, то теперь надо завести ВСЕ генераторы, водить как пса маньяка пол катки, открыть сундуки, помочь тиммейтам. И не факт, что получишь каплю. 
В принципе, поработая над балансом, игра вновь станет интересной, где целью будет не получение капли, а получение удовольствия!!!
